column1: [28]  As  the  VAT  Act  does  not  provide  a  statutory  definition  to  the  term
“export”, this Court has to decide what is envisaged by the term “export” for
the purpose of Section 7 (1) (a) of the VAT Act, No. 14 of 2002.  It has now
become necessary to construe the scope of the term “export”  by using its
ordinary  or  literal  meanings  in  common  parlance  as  understood  in  its
natural  and  grammatic  manner  in  the  context  in  which  it  occurs  for  the
application of Section 7 (1) (a)  of the VAT Act, No. 14 of 2002 (as amended).
